00040 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/TwistWithId.h"
00041 
00042 #include <kdl/frames.hpp>
00043 
00044 using namespace KDL;
00045 
00046 TwistWithId::TwistWithId() {
00047     id = "";
00048     twist = new Twist();
00049 }
00050 
00051 TwistWithId::TwistWithId(const std::string& id) {
00052     this->id = id;
00053     this->twist = new Twist(); 
00054 }
00055 
00056 TwistWithId::TwistWithId(const KDL::Twist& twist) {
00057     this->id = "";
00058     this->twist = new Twist(twist); 
00059 }
00060 
00061 TwistWithId::TwistWithId(const KDL::Twist& twist, const std::string& id) {
00062     this->id = id;
00063     this->twist = new Twist(twist);
00064 }
00065 
00066 TwistWithId::TwistWithId(const TwistWithId& orig) {
00067     id = orig.id;
00068     twist = new Twist(orig.getTwist());
00069 }
00070 
00071 const TwistWithId& TwistWithId::operator=(const TwistWithId& orig) {
00072     id = orig.id;
00073     delete twist;
00074     twist = new Twist(orig.getTwist());
00075     
00076     return *this;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void TwistWithId::setTwist(const KDL::Twist& orig) {
00080     delete this->twist;
00081     this->twist = new Twist(orig);
00082 }
00083 
00084 const KDL::Twist& TwistWithId::getTwist() const {
00085     return *twist;
00086 }
00087     
00088 KDL::Twist& TwistWithId::getTwist() {
00089     return *twist;
00090 }
00091 
00092 TwistWithId::~TwistWithId() {
00093     delete twist;
00094 }
